content.description: This obscure route is located on the backside (south face) of the large boulder in front of The Hen Pecked Boulder.  It has one bolt, and uses natural gear the rest of the way.
content.protection: A QD for the one bolt, then some sm to med gear for a few more piece on this moderate climb.
content.location: Backside (so.face) of a large boulder in front of The Hen Pecked Boulder in the Hen House Area.

content.description: Another cool moderate face climb at the Hen House.  This climb is located on the NW face of a large boulder in front of the Rooster Boulder.
content.location: On a large boulder in front of The Rooster Boulder at the Hen House Area.

content.description: The name of this climb tells it all. Climb up a very grainy face with a few difficult and thin moves past 4 or 5 bolts to the top.  For a climb that pretty much sucks, it still has some strange appeal, so I had to give it one star.
content.protection: Bolts only. Maybe a sling near the top to tie off a giant knob.
content.location: This climb is on a south facing formation just before you reach the Hen house, so it faces the Hen House area. As you hike it, it is usually on your left.

content.description: Featured slab route up the middle of Epperson Boulder.
3 bolt face right of Epperson's Footprints.
content.protection: QDs for three bolts, one bolt on top for directional before you traverse left to the anchor on Epperson's Footprints.....
content.location: Right side of Epperson Boulder, Hen House Area

content.description: This route ascents the face and edge to the left of Chicken Coop, on the small steep face below the Epperson Boulder. It is located on the left edge of this face. There are 2 bolted face climbs on this steep face; this is the left one.
content.protection: Three or four bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: On the left edge of the small steep face below the Epperson Boulder.

content.description: On the small steep face below the Epperson Boulder are two bolted face climbs.  This is the right of the two, and has 3 bolts.
content.protection: QDs for the 3 bolts, to a bolted anchor.
content.location: On the small steep face below the Epperson Boulder in the Hen House Area.

content.description: This cool climb ascends the crack (left to right) on the Rooster Boulder, and meets up with the route Ruffled Rooster (5.9) for it's last little bit up the arete/face.
content.protection: Small to large, but mostly hand.
content.location: On the N. face of the large Rooster Boulder at the Hen House Area.

content.description: Step onto the Epperson Boulder about eight feet right of Foghorn Leghorn and climb a small, varnished right facing corner and the arÃªte to the top.
content.location: Start on a boulder at the very right edge of the south face of the Epperson Boulder.
